title: Subway worker Javier Flores killed protecting his mom, who worked with him - National | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 24, 2017 1:40 am Updated: February 24, 2017 1:41 am Subway worker Javier Flores killed protecting his mom, who worked with him By Staff The Associated Press 
People pay their respect at a vigil held for the 18-year-old Subway employee Javier Flores Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017, in Houston. Police say the Flores and his mother were the only people working in the southeast Houston Subway restaurant near closing time Wednesday night when two assailants rushed in and pointed a gun at the woman. Flores was fatally shot as he tried to protect his mother during an attempted robbery at the store. Yi-Chin Lee/Houston Chronicle via AP What is this?
